text: jo badâ€Œdoo peechhe rah gae the, ve ab tumase kahege, "hamaare maal aur hamaare gharavaalon ne hamen vyast kar rakha tha; to aap hamaare lie kshama kee praarthana keejie." ve apanee zabaanon se ve baaten kahate hai jo unake dilon mein nahin. kahana ki, "kaun hai jo allaah ke muqaabale mein tumhaare kie kisee cheez ka adhikaar rakhata hai, yadi vah tumhen koee haani pahunchaanee chaahe ya vah tumhen koee laabh pahunchaane ka iraada kare? balki jo kuchh tum karate ho allaah usakee khabar rakhata hai.
